name: The Time of My Life
description:
A fun bullet hell with some time related mechanics. This is our first game jam, so we're open to any and all feedback.

Controls: WASD to move and hold space to stop time. Once you run out of the time of your life, you die. You still lose time while stopping time, and you lose it faster and faster the longer you stop time to dodge bullets.

------ Credits ------

Made by bbrb and dirt

Playtested by bbrb, bh, BlobbyPickles, dirt, SourTrout, and Wizard
